CustomField.description: Not necessary to add new markets here! New markets should are added automatically with Invoice_From_Spotify_Entity__c which OpportunityTriggerHandler.cls sets.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used by downstream integrations to define the spotify company we invoice from. This is a formula that users "invoice from office"-picklist before "invoice from spotify entity".
CustomField.label: Spotify Legal Entity
